main event: Multiple witnesses reported observing a bright, circular object in the sky across various locations in Alabama, Georgia, and Florida on 13 November 1957.
interesting points: The object resembled a dime or football in shape and was observed at a high speed,One witness estimated the object at about the size of a commercial blimp,Others at the scene thought the object might be a meteor but noted its speed was too slow for that,The object emitted colors, including red and green, and had a bright glow,Four confirmed separate sightings were reported at different times and locations by multiple witnesses.
witness description: Individuals included both military personnel and civilians near the observation locations.
